01689 
01690 protected:
01691     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
01692     //  Protected data members
01693     //
01694     //  fCurrentNode
01695     //  fCurrentParent
01696     //      Used to track the current node during nested element events. Since
01697     //      the tree must be built from a set of disjoint callbacks, we need
01698     //      these to keep up with where we currently are.
01699     //
01700     //  fCurrentEntity
01701     //      Used to track the current entity decl.  If a text decl is seen later on,
01702     //      it is used to update the encoding and version information.
01703     //
01704     //  fDocument
01705     //      The root document object, filled with the document contents.
01706     //
01707     //  fCreateEntityReferenceNodes
01708     //      Indicates whether entity reference nodes should be created.
01709     //
01710     //  fIncludeIgnorableWhitespace
01711     //      Indicates whether ignorable whitespace should be added to
01712     //      the DOM tree for validating parsers.
01713     //
01714     //  fScanner
01715     //      The scanner used for this parser. This is created during the
01716     //      constructor.
01717     //
01718     //  fImplementationFeatures
01719     //      The implementation features that we use to get an implementation
01720     //      for use in creating the DOMDocument used during parse. If this is
01721     //      null then the default DOMImplementation is used
01722     //
01723     //  fParseInProgress
01724     //      Used to prevent multiple entrance to the parser while its doing
01725     //      a parse.
01726     //
01727     //  fWithinElement
01728     //      A flag to indicate that the parser is within at least one level
01729     //      of element processing.
01730     //
01731     //  fDocumentType
01732     //      Used to store and update the documentType variable information
01733     //      in fDocument
01734     //
01735     //  fDocumentVector
01736     //      Store all the previous fDocument(s) (thus not the current fDocument)
01737     //      created in this parser.  It is destroyed when the parser is destructed.
01738     //
01739     //  fCreateCommentNodes
01740     //      Indicates whether comment nodes should be created.
01741     //
01742     //  fDocumentAdoptedByUser
01743     //      The DOMDocument ownership has been transferred to application
01744     //      If set to true, the parser does not own the document anymore
01745     //      and thus will not release its memory.
01746     //
01747     //  fInternalSubset
01748     //      Buffer for storing the internal subset information.
01749     //      Once complete (after DOCTYPE is finished scanning), send
01750     //      it to DocumentType Node
01751     //
01752     //   fGrammarPool
01753     //      The grammar pool passed from external application (through derivatives).
01754     //      which could be 0, not owned.
01755     //
01756     //  fCreateSchemaInfo
01757     //      Indicates whether element and attributes will have schema info associated
01758     //
01759     //   fDoXinclude
01760     //      A bool used to request that XInlcude processing occur on the
01761     //      Document the parser parses.
01762     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
01763     bool                          fCreateEntityReferenceNodes;
01764     bool                          fIncludeIgnorableWhitespace;
01765     bool                          fWithinElement;
01766     bool                          fParseInProgress;
01767     bool                          fCreateCommentNodes;
01768     bool                          fDocumentAdoptedByUser;
01769     bool                          fCreateSchemaInfo;
01770     bool                          fDoXInclude;
01771     XMLScanner*                   fScanner;
01772     XMLCh*                        fImplementationFeatures;
01773     DOMNode*                      fCurrentParent;
01774     DOMNode*                      fCurrentNode;
01775     DOMEntityImpl*                fCurrentEntity;
01776     DOMDocumentImpl*              fDocument;
01777     DOMDocumentTypeImpl*          fDocumentType;
01778     RefVectorOf<DOMDocumentImpl>* fDocumentVector;
01779     GrammarResolver*              fGrammarResolver;
01780     XMLStringPool*                fURIStringPool;
01781     XMLValidator*                 fValidator;
01782     MemoryManager*                fMemoryManager;
01783     XMLGrammarPool*               fGrammarPool;
01784     XMLBufferMgr                  fBufMgr;
01785     XMLBuffer&                    fInternalSubset;
01786     PSVIHandler*                  fPSVIHandler;
01787 };

01860 
01861 inline void AbstractDOMParser::useImplementation(const XMLCh* const implementationFeatures)
01862 {
01863     fMemoryManager->deallocate(fImplementationFeatures);
01864     fImplementationFeatures = XMLString::replicate(implementationFeatures, fMemoryManager);
01865 }
01866 
01867 inline void AbstractDOMParser::setDoXInclude(const bool newState)
01868 {
01869     fDoXInclude = newState;
01870 }
